content:
You've already got a wireless charging pad that's serving you well.

Regarding your phone's battery life, a higher-capacity power bank can definitely be a good investment. A 20,000mAh or higher power bank can provide multiple full charges for your phone, depending on its battery capacity.

Here's a rough estimate of how many full charges you can expect from a 20,000mAh power bank:

* For a phone with a 3,000mAh battery, you can get around 6-7 full charges.
* For a phone with a 4,000mAh battery, you can get around 4-5 full charges.

Keep in mind that these are rough estimates and actual performance may vary depending on the power bank's efficiency, your phone's battery health, and other factors.

If your phone's battery life has been terrible lately, a higher-capacity power bank can provide a sense of security and convenience, especially when you're traveling or away from a power source for an extended period.

However, it's also important to consider the size and weight of the power bank. A larger capacity often means a larger and heavier power bank, which may not be ideal for carrying around.

If you do decide to get a higher-capacity power bank, look for one that's compact and lightweight, yet still offers a high capacity. Some power banks, like the Anker PowerCore 20000, are designed to be compact and portable despite their high capacity.

Ultimately, it's up to you to weigh the pros and cons and decide whether a higher-capacity power bank is right for your needs.
